original_title: A Bride Comes to Yellow Sky
overview: The train brings Marshal Jack Potter and his new bride to the dusty outpost of Yellow Sky on the parched sands of west Texas. Meanwhile, Scratchy Wilson, the local n'ere-do-well lies in wait after frightening the townspeople with his blazing six-gun. In the final showdown, how will anyone walk away?
title: A Bride Comes to Yellow Sky
